CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . INV explains the warm-up task to MOT and then leaves the room
MOT is on her knees on the floor holding CHI . MOT puts CHI down on the floor
CHI reaches for the toy car on the floor
CHI rolls car back and forth on the rug
MOT is kneeling on the floor beside CHI . MOT leans forward on one hand looking at CHI
CHI turns and looks around while holding the car up in the air
<bef> MOT moves her pocketbook and day bag out of the way
CHI turns then looks up and around the room
MOT taps her hand on the rug in front of CHI
CHI puts the car on the floor between his legs
MOT reaches over then spins the car wheels
MOT spins the wheels of the car
CHI looks down then reaches for a wheel while holding up the car
CHI turns then looks up at MOT briefly . <aft> CHI looks down at car in his hand
CHI looks down at the car
MOT reaches down tapping the rug in front of CHI
CHI looks down and straight ahead where MOT taps the rug
MOT moves her arm back away from CHI
CHI puts the car on the rug in front of him
CHI rolls the car back and forth
<aft> MOT reaches down then rolls the car back and forth with CHI
CHI leans forward touching the jack+in+the+box then moves the jack+in+the+box closer
CHI holds the car in one hand as she moves the jack+in+the+box with the other
CHI touches the jack+in+the+box . CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box then up at MOT briefly
<bef> MOT reaches out for the jack+in+the+box then turns it around once full circle on the rug in front of CHI
<$=2> MOT taps the front of the jack+in+the+box
<$=2> MOT refers to the pictures on the jack+in+the+box in this sequence
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box and points to a different side
CHI reaches out then hits the top of the jack+in+the+box repeatedly
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box to the next panel
MOT refers to CHI hitting the jack+in+the+box
MOT pulls her hand back then reaches down turning the handle once
MOT turns the jack+in+the+box around so the handle is close to CHI then points to where the handle is on the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches down then begins to turn the handle
MOT rests her hand on top of the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches down to direct CHI on how to turn the handle
MOT rests one hand on top of the jack+in+the+box holding the box in place
CHI has difficulty turning the handle full circle so he swings the crank back and forth
MOT moves on her knees behind CHI then MOT rests her hand on CHI hand
CHI looks down with his hand under MOT hand as they turn the crank together
MOT starts to lean back away from CHI
MOT moves back closer to CHI then puts her hand over CHI hand
MOT helps CHI manipulate the crank
CHI turns the crank then stops
CHI looks off to the side with a hand still on the crank
MOT moves her hand over onto CHI forearm
CHI reaches out touching the clown then pushes it down
MOT reaches for the clown then shakes it a little
CHI reaches for the lid to the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts her finger on the clown head then gently pushes down
CHI attempts to close the lid on the clown
CHI puts a hand on top of the clown then pushes down
MOT continues to gently push down on clown
CHI puts a hand on the lid then closes it
MOT keeps her hand on the top of the lid as it is not closed completely
MOT tries to close the lid tightly
MOT adjusts the handle so the lid will remain closed
MOT removes her hand from the jack+in+the+box
MOT holds on to the side of the jack+in+the+box to hold it in place
CHI rocks back and forth while turning the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT sings the jack+in+the+box tune as CHI turns the handle
CHI turns the handle then the jack+in+the+box pops out
CHI pulls the clown up and down
MOT leans down on her elbow next to CHI
CHI holds the clowns head while looking at it
MOT reaches out and holds on to the clown
CHI pushes the clown up and down
CHI continues to push the clown down and up
MOT reaches for the lid with one finger
CHI pushes the clown up and down as MOT tries to instruct CHI to close the top
CHI pushes the clown way down into the box then lets go of the clown and it pops up
MOT holds the clown down in the box with one finger
CHI closes the top then keeps a hand on top of the lid
MOT hurriedly moves a hand to the top of the box as the clown begins to pop out again
MOT adjusts the handle so the box will remain closed
CHI reaches down to the handle then begins to turn it
<$=1> MOT holds on to the side of the box to keep it in place
<bef> CHI stops turning the handle then moves a hand to the lid . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
MOT looks down at CHI while holding on to the side of the box
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box . CHI starts to reach for the handle then moves a hand to the top of the jack+in+the+box again in attempt to open the lid with his fingers
<$=1> MOT holds the jack+in+the+box in place with one hand
MOT moves her hand to the box holding it in place
CHI looks down to where MOT points then reaches down for the handle
CHI begins to turn the handle then moves a hand to the top of the jack+in+the+box again
MOT reaches down for the handle then moves her hand back to the side of the box
CHI tries to open the lid with his fingers then reaches down for the handle
MOT refers to telephone ring in the background
<aft> CHI looks up at MOT then over his shoulder towards the door
CHI reaches down then turns the handle
CHI turns the handle then stops
CHI rocks back and forth while attempting to turn the handle again
<aft> MOT moves the handle a bit
<aft> MOT moves her hand towards the handle again then pulls her hand back
CHI reaches for the handle again then begins to turn it
CHI stops turning the handle then moves his hand to the lid
MOT leans down on one elbow next to CHI . MOT looks at CHI briefly then at the jack+in+the+box
CHI reaches for the handle then turns it
CHI looks up at MOT while turning the handle then looks back down again
CHI turns the handle then stops
CHI has some difficulty manipulating the handle
MOT reaches for the handle then moves it down slightly
MOT refers to her gesture of moving the handle down a bit
CHI reaches down and touches the handle
CHI moves a hand to the top of the jack+in+the+box and attempts to open the lid with his fingers
MOT begins to turn the handle to demonstrate then stops
CHI leans back slightly watching MOT turn the handle then CHI reaches for the handle
INV explains small scale activity then leaves the room
MOT lifts CHI out of chair
MOT places CHI on the floor
CHI reaches for the tape on the floor and touches it
MOT is visible from the waist down
CHI touches the tape on the floor
MOT kneels down on the floor beside CHI placing a box on the floor
MOT slides the box so it is in front of CHI
CHI lifts the ball out of the box then holds it up in the air
MOT slides the box off to the side
MOT sits down beside CHI on the floor
CHI places the ball on the floor then taps it a couple of times
CHI moves the ball up and down in the air then lets it go in the direction of MOT
MOT rolls the ball back in the direction of CHI
CHI looks down then reaches for the adhesive tape on the floor
MOT rolls the ball around on the floor
CHI leans back away from the tape . CHI looks down
MOT picks up the ball then rolls it towards CHI
MOT slides the box over to hide tape
CHI picks up the ball then stuffs it into the box
MOT leans forward placing both hands on the box
MOT reaches into the box then holds down the side flaps
CHI takes the ball out of the box
<aft> CHI holds the ball up in the air
CHI drops the ball then picks it up again
MOT slides box closer to CHI
CHI holds the ball in the air and moves it up and down
MOT points inside the box then leans back and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the box beside him then looks in the direction of MOT
CHI back is to the camera but his gestures are clear
CHI moves the ball up and down in the air
MOT drops her hands to the floor
CHI leans forward in the direction of MOT then lets go of the ball
MOT holds the ball up in the air
CHI leans back away from MOT
MOT drops the ball to the floor
<bef> MOT picks up the ball then drops it again in front of CHI
CHI leans forward and picks up the ball
CHI leans back holding the ball
MOT taps the ball as CHI holds it in the air
MOT leans forward in the direction of CHI
MOT is responding to CHI's previous turn
MOT leans back after hugging CHI
CHI gets up on his knees while holding the ball against his cheek
MOT is responding to CHI's previous vocalization
MOT watches CHI as CHI sways back and forth
CHI looks down to his side then stuffs the ball in the box that is next to him on the floor
MOT reaches for the box then turns it upside down
CHI moves on his knees towards the box
CHI reaches for the box then looks up at MOT briefly
CHI puts his hand in the hole in the bottom of the box
MOT lifts the box a little with her finger
CHI moves the box a little
CHI moves the box uncovering the ball
CHI rolls the ball over to the box then picks up the box
MOT reaches for the box then withdraws her hand
CHI reaches for the ball with one hand while holding the box in the other
<aft> MOT reaches for the box then withdraws her hand
CHI sits back pulling the box onto his lap
MOT rolls the ball on the floor between them
CHI picks up the ball then stuffs it into the box
MOT reaches to her side then holds the box in place
CHI gets up on his knees then reaches into the box
<aft> MOT lets go of the box
CHI pulls on one half of the box flap
CHI pulls on the box flap
MOT reaches for the box with one hand
CHI pulls on the box flap then lets go of the box
MOT pulls the other flap up so the box is closed with the ball in it
MOT moves the box a bit so it is in front of CHI
CHI reaches for the box then leans forward to look inside
MOT leans forward and looks into the box
CHI pulls up one of the box flaps
MOT checks her watch then gets up on her knees beside CHI
MOT removes the box and ball from in front of CHI
CHI turns around and looks up towards MOT
MOT places the new box on the floor in front of CHI
CHI reaches out and touches the box
MOT holds the box on the floor as she looks over at CHI
MOT slides her hand to the front of the box then begins to open it
CHI reaches forward then takes the cover off of the box
CHI pulls the towel out of the box
<aft> CHI leans back with the towel then reaches forward for the box with his other hand
MOT points as she moves on her knees to face CHI
CHI looks up at MOT then down at the towel in his hand
MOT reaches over and takes the towel from CHI
MOT gently tosses towel on CHI head so that it covers him
CHI sits on floor beside MOT covered by the towel
CHI pulls the towel off of his head
CHI reaches over for the chair in front of him
MOT reaches down for the towel on the floor that CHI has discarded
CHI holds on to one leg of the chair and rocks it gently
MOT places the towel over her own head
CHI turns and looks over in the direction of MOT
MOT leans forward on both hands facing CHI with the towel over her head
CHI reaches out and pulls the towel off of MOT head
CHI leans forward then reaches up and touches MOT face
MOT places her hand on back of CHI head
CHI leans back and is now sitting on the floor
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
CHI reaches up with both hands then pulls the towel down
<bef> MOT pulls the towel up in front of her face then peeks out from behind it at CHI
CHI holds on to his end of the towel
<bef> MOT pulls the towel up in front of her face then peeks out from behind it at CHI
CHI gets up on his knees and lets go of his end of the towel
MOT holds the towel up then peeks out from behind it at CHI
CHI reaches up for the towel and pulls it down . CHI looks up at MOT
MOT holds one end of the towel as CHI holds the other end
<aft> MOT tosses the towel gently so it covers CHI head
CHI moves the towel and looks up at MOT
MOT leans forward slightly and looks at CHI
CHI gets up on his knees then moves toward the chair
MOT gets up on her knees and holds the towel up
MOT moves on her knees closer to CHI then hangs the towel over the back of the chair
MOT moves the chair a bit closer to herself
CHI kneels on the floor and watches MOT
MOT moves the chair over so it is between her and CHI
MOT moves the chair closer so she can hide behind the chair with the towel draped over it
CHI moves closer to the chair while on his knees . CHI holds on to the seat of the chair
MOT hangs the towel over her head as she hides behind both the towel and the chair
CHI reaches up for the towel
CHI pulls the towel down from in front of MOT face and drops it to the floor
MOT looks at CHI from behind the chair
MOT moves the towel that CHI has put on the floor
CHI holds onto the chair pulling himself up on his feet . CHI faces MOT with the chair between them
MOT touches the back of the chair briefly
CHI reaches out for the back of the chair then rocks the chair
<aft> MOT holds the towel in the air moving it towards CHI
MOT drapes the towel over CHI head
CHI pulls the towel off of his head
CHI moves his shoulders from side to side with the towel on his chest
MOT reaches out and touches CHI nose briefly
MOT pulls the towel off of CHI chest
MOT reaches down to her side for the box that the towel came in
CHI looks down then gets down on the floor and turns away from MOT
MOT places the towel in the box then moves it off to the side . MOT pushes the chair out of her way
MOT gets up on her knees then places the towel box on the desk
CHI crawls over to where there is a small stool on the floor . CHI back is to MOT
CHI pulls himself up on his knees using the stool
MOT looks over to where CHI is on the floor
MOT looks down at CHI while placing a new box on the floor between them
CHI moves the stool around a bit on the floor
MOT looks over in direction of CHI
CHI turns and looks over his shoulder then down at the box on the floor
CHI leans over then reaches into the box
MOT reaches into the box and picks up a couple of crayons
CHI leans forward placing both hands inside the box
MOT leans over the box placing some crayons in her hand and holding them out towards CHI
MOT reaches down and flips over a piece of paper
CHI leans back and kneels on the floor by the box looking down
MOT rifles through some of the paper in the box
CHI moves a little closer to MOT and remains kneeling
MOT chooses a crayon then holds it out in the direction of CHI
MOT places the other crayons on the floor
CHI takes the crayon and looks down at it in his hand
MOT holds her hand on a piece of paper in the box
<bef> CHI reaches down into the box with the crayon then leans back again
CHI reaches down for more crayons on the floor beside him
CHI now has crayons in both hands
CHI inches over on his knees so he is in front of the box
<bef> MOT looks down at the paper then starts to look through them
CHI looks down then starts to reach down with a crayon then brings his hand back
MOT turns the pile over so the blank side faces up
CHI leans down into the box with a crayon then leans back again
MOT picks up a crayon out of the box and draws a line
<bef> CHI looks down then off to his side
CHI picks a crayon up off the floor beside him then starts to color
CHI stops coloring then looks off to his side on the floor
CHI puts the crayon on the floor beside him
CHI picks up the crayon again then looks down in the direction of the paper
CHI drops the crayon in his hand then picks it up again . CHI starts to color
MOT places her hand over CHI hand to assist him in coloring
MOT moves her hand and CHI hand together across the paper holding the crayon
MOT lets go of CHI hand then looks up at CHI
CHI touches the paper with the crayon then moves it away
CHI looks down then over at his left hand
CHI looks down while holding the crayon on the paper
MOT moves CHI hand and crayon across the paper
CHI reaches down for a crayon in the box while holding another crayon in the air with his other hand
CHI looks at the crayons he holds in his hands
MOT looks down and feels around on the floor for crayons
MOT reaches into the box and moves around some paper
CHI reaches down with the crayon into the box while holding more crayons in his other hand
MOT picks up a crayon and colors
<aft> MOT drops her crayon back into the box on the paper in front of CHI
CHI reaches into the box picking up the crayon MOT dropped . CHI looks up at MOT then at the crayons in his hands
CHI looks off to one side on the floor then at the crayons in his hands
CHI looks at the crayons in his hand then reaches down with a fistful of crayons into the box
MOT reaches out for CHI hand
MOT tries to move CHI hand across the paper but CHI resists
CHI moves his hand away from MOT hand
MOT lets go of CHI hand then points at the paper
CHI looks down while holding some crayons in each hand
MOT moves her hands away and folds them across her knees
CHI reaches down into the box with a crayon
MOT reaches into the box holding the paper in place
MOT reaches for crayon in CHI hand
MOT picks up a crayon in one hand while reaching over for the crayon in CHI hand
CHI leans back with a crayon in his hand then takes the crayon from MOT hand
CHI looks down then leans forward into the box
MOT reaches over and takes CHI hand in hers then colors
MOT reaches for one half of the box then turns it over and puts it on the floor in front of CHI
MOT places a sheet of paper on top of the box
MOT arranges the paper on the box in front of CHI
MOT leans forward over the box
CHI stops coloring and looks down
MOT points then looks up at CHI
CHI reaches down with a crayon in his other hand
CHI looks off to his side at something
MOT looks off to the side
CHI reaches over into the other box on the floor beside him
MOT moves the other box closer to CHI
CHI colors on the paper inside one box
<aft> CHI looks over at the other box then starts to draw on it
MOT rests one hand on each piece of paper in the two separate boxes
CHI looks down at the drawing then looks over to the other box on the floor beside him . CHI reaches down to color in the other box
<bef> MOT checks her watch then looks at CHI coloring . <aft> MOT looks over her shoulder towards the desk
CHI turns his attention to the box in front of him
CHI colors as he moves from one box to the other
CHI stops coloring then turns his attention in the direction MOT points . <aft> CHI reaches for crayon on the floor
MOT withdraws her hand then rests on top of the box in front of CHI
CHI holds a crayon in each hand and looks down at one hand then the other
CHI looks up in direction of MOT then over at something to his left
MOT picks up the box on the floor next to CHI and flips it over bottom side up . MOT places a piece of paper on top of the box
CHI watches MOT turn the box over
MOT points then looks up at CHI briefly
CHI looks down then reaches over to color on the paper
MOT holds the paper in place on top of the box
CHI leans back as he looks down at the crayon in his hand
CHI's complete gesture is blocked by the chair that is attached to the table
MOT folds her arms across her waist as she watches CHI
MOT reaches down to hold the paper in place on top of the box
CHI looks from one box to the other
MOT moves her hand to hold the paper in place on the other box
CHI drops two crayons on the box in front of him . CHI picks up one of the crayons and holds it upright on top of the box
MOT picks up one of the crayons CHI has dropped
MOT reaches over and covers CHI hand with her own then moves CHI hand back and forth
MOT lets go of CHI hand
CHI looks down at the crayon in his hand
CHI reaches down to his left to color on another piece of paper
CHI coloring causes the paper to slide off the box
MOT holds the paper in place for CHI
CHI leans back then looks down at the crayon in his hand . <aft> CHI reaches down for crayon on the box in front of him
MOT picks up the paper then turns the box over
MOT puts paper inside the box
CHI looks down following MOT motion
MOT points then looks at CHI briefly
MOT slides the two box halves so that the half with the paper in it is closer to CHI
MOT points into the box and taps on the paper inside with her finger
<aft> MOT slides the boxes closer to CHI
CHI looks down then moves his head from side to side as he watches MOT slide the boxes
MOT points then looks up at CHI briefly
CHI leans forward reaching into the box with the crayon then leans back away from the box holding the crayon
MOT picks up the top half of the box
MOT moves the top half of the box over the bottom half of the box but does not close it completely
<aft> MOT puts her hand inside the box and taps on the paper inside
CHI looks down at the floor to his left then reaches over for the top of the box MOT is holding
MOT reaches across the box and in front of CHI for something
CHI overextends himself as he leans forward to push the top of the box away
CHI falls into the box but balances himself on one arm
MOT looks at CHI as she holds one end of the box top
CHI reaches out then pushes the box top away . <aft> CHI leans back
<$=1> MOT looks at CHI as she holds the top of the box upright on the floor
CHI looks down at the crayons in his hands then reaches into the box in front of him for some paper
MOT reaches for something on the desk out of camera view
CHI takes a crayon out of the box
<aft> CHI leans back then looks down
MOT places another box on the floor beside the crayon and paper box
MOT reaches for crayons in CHI hand
CHI moves his hand away from MOT reach . CHI reaches down for some crayons in the box
MOT looks at CHI then reaches over to the desk to put the box away
CHI looks down as he holds the crayons in his hand then looks up as MOT puts the box on the desk
CHI leans over with the crayons to where the new box is located on the floor
MOT reaches for the crayons in CHI hand
CHI moves his hand away from MOT as she tries to get the crayons
CHI leans forward on his knees reaching into the box
CHI back is to the camera
MOT takes the crayons from CHI
MOT holds the book out in the direction of CHI
MOT moves the book back and forth in front of CHI
MOT shows CHI the design on the cover of the book
<bef> CHI holds on to the book as MOT moves it . <aft> CHI reaches over the book to MOT hand
<bef> MOT puts the book on the floor between them
CHI takes the crayon out of MOT hand
CHI looks down at one hand then the other as he holds the crayons
MOT closes the cover on the box that the book was in
CHI looks down at the crayons in his hand then looks up in the direction of MOT
CHI back is to the camera
MOT picks up the book off the floor
MOT opens the book then holds it out in front of CHI
MOT slides the box a bit closer to them and rests the book on top of it
CHI looks on as he holds the crayons in his hand
MOT points then looks over at CHI briefly
CHI reaches down for the book then begins to turn the page
MOT reaches out to assist CHI in turning the page
MOT holds on to the top of the page
CHI looks down as he turns the page
MOT tilts the book up a bit to get a better hold on it
MOT points then looks over at CHI briefly
CHI back is to the camera during this entire sequence
CHI turns the page with the hand he holds the crayon in
MOT lowers her voice significantly when saying bear
MOT looks at CHI while pointing to the opposite page
CHI turns his head in the direction MOT points
MOT points to the opposite page
CHI points to picture of horse then turns around to look behind him . CHI looks around the room
CHI turns in response to noise outside the room
CHI turns around then looks down at the book
MOT looks from CHI to book a couple of times
CHI looks down as he turns the page
<bef> CHI turns the page . <aft> CHI points then looks at the crayon in his hand
<aft> MOT looks over at CHI then down at the book as she turns the page
CHI looks down at the crayon in his hand then over at the book
CHI looks around in response to noise outside of the room
